about_the_game:
The game is about finding 20 clowns who have wandered into a castle!

Try to find clowns in the vast stage!

There are a total of 100 characters in this game!

You can also talk to all of the characters.

Experience not only the search for clowns, but also what kind of characters live in the game world!!
detailed_description:
The game is about finding 20 clowns who have wandered into a castle!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (4 core) / Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal対応GPU (Intel UHD 630 / Apple M1)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 (Big Sur)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal対応GPU (M1 Pro / M2)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Find Clowns

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R9 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
